translations: n.力霸式针织机；离开的人（常指学校毕业生）（leaver 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Will you go to the school-leavers' party tomorrow?
sentences.translation: 你明天会去参加离校聚会吗？

sentences.sentence: Could you tell me when we will have the school leavers' party?
sentences.translation: 你能告诉我我们什么时候举行毕业晚会吗？

sentences.sentence: There will be a big party for the school-leavers this evening.
sentences.translation: 今晚这里将有一个大型的离校生聚会。
